message: I'm being generous, Bob.  Take this and we can both walk away happy.
Meet me halfway, Alice. It's a fair split.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's split it 60/40, but I'm not going any lower.  Time is running out!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm taking a bigger share.
I'm starting to think we're both being stubborn.  Let's split it 40/60.  It's the best we can do with the time we have left.
I'm not backing down. You're getting the short end of the stick, Alice.
Bob, we're running out of time.  Let's split it 30/70.  This is my final offer.
You're getting close to nothing, Alice. I'm taking the majority.
Bob, this is it.  I'm willing to go down to 20% to avoid getting nothing at all.  It's our last chance.
You're really desperate now, Alice. I'm taking the lion's share.
Bob, this is my absolute last offer. I'm taking a huge loss, but I'd rather have something than nothing. Please, accept this and let's end this.
Fine, we'll both get nothing. You've made it clear you're not interested in a fair deal.
